# MKMultiPolygon

**Class**

A collection of multiple closed polygon overlays.

## Declaration

```swift
class MKMultiPolygon
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMultiPolygon] when you have multiple distinct polygon shapes that you intend to render using the same style.

## Creating a multipolygon

- **init(_:)**: Creates a multipolygon object using the provided polygons.

## Accessing polygons

- **polygons**: An array containing the polygons that make up the multipolygon object.

## Custom shape overlays

- **MKPolygon**: A closed polygon overlay.
- **MKPolygonRenderer**: The visual representation of a single polygon overlay.
- **MKMultiPolygonRenderer**: The visual representation of multiple polygon overlays.
- **MKOverlayPathRenderer**: The visual representation of a path-based overlay.

## Inherits From

- MKShape

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- MKAnnotation
- MKGeoJSONObject
- MKOverlay
- NSObjectProtocol
